title: The Eden Plague
description: Military combat sci-fi apocalypse techno-thriller PREQUEL.Rule#1: Try not to shoot your future wife.Veteran combat medic Daniel Markis reacts on instinct against armed invaders in his home. Who is the man he kills, the woman he shoots, and what is the Eden Plague? Fleeing the shadowy Company, Daniel turns to fellow soldiers. He fights back, seeks the woman, and wants answers. A secret threatens world stability and a conspiracy could change everything.
author: David VanDyke
